sentence.Network_cn: 她让人在公寓墙壁上涂上灰泥.

entry.def: Stucco is a type of plaster used for covering walls and decorating ceilings.

means.word_mean: 1. a plaster now made mostly from Portland cement and sand and lime; applied while soft to cover exterior walls or surfaces
